page.title: 18Bedgrove Pavilion
page.content: Bedgrove Pavilion is much the same as Weston Turville Village Hall.They often hold jumble sales,raffles and fetes.Once a year they hold a sports day.There they have skipping races, running races,and three legged-races. Round the Pavilion they have running tracks. Once a year they hold a fete.Local groups like the Brownies,the Health Centre,and St.John's Ambulance men have stalls to sell things to raise money. Every morning there is a playschool at the pavilion for children under five.It lasts for two and a half hours.
